transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Haan ji sir, ab bataiye aap. Vinod ji aawaz. 
Customer: Ji ji. Main account manager se baat karna chahta hu lekin number jo nikalta hai woh kahan se nikal raha hai thoda mujhe.
Executive: Aapka jo account manager hai woh main hi hu sir. Aap ye jo mera number hai na, ye aap save kar do. Haan, main hu aapki account manager. Aap mera number save kar lo, mera naam Niba hai. Agar aage aapko kuch bhi aapki aap. 
Customer: Ji. Ji boliye.
Executive: Agar jaise abhi aapne hamare customer care call kiya hai right. Agar aage aapko kuch bhi issue ho ya kuch bhi concern ho na, aap mujhe directly is same number mera calling pe bhi hai aur same number WhatsApp par bhi hai. Toh aap mujhe same WhatsApp par call pe aap kabhi bhi mujhe connect kar sakte ho 926 mein mere working hours mein.
Customer: Theek hai. Main ye bol raha hu ki isme. Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Ji, isme aapka number kahan pe show karta hai? Kuch update hua hai kya application mein?
Executive: No sir, mera jo number hai na woh aapki profile mein hi show karega niche jaake. Jab aap dekhoge na profile mein toh wahan pe account manager karke naam bhi aayega aur number bhi aata hai.
Customer: Lekin wohi cheez dikh nahi raha na madam. Mera yahan main laptop mein open kar raha hu toh kuch thoda sa alag khul raha hai. Yahan pe kuch profile pe click kiya profile pe gaya toh kuch dikhai nahi de raha hai.
Executive: Ah, ek second main check kar rahi hu ek minute main aapko batati hu. Ek second sir.

Executive: Hello. Ji. Aap sir apna ye jo hai aapne like laptop pe hi login kiya hai na?
Customer: Ji ji, laptop pe hi kiya hu.
Executive: Laptop pe wahan pe sabse pehle aapko ek option sir hoga dashboard karke. Side mein left side mein sabse upar aa raha hai dashboard karke. Usko aap jab click karoge na usko. Ji ji aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan, usko scroll karoge na niche jaake aapka mera naam aur number dikhega.
Customer: Wohi cheez nahi aa raha na madam. Yahan pe kya hai kuch alag hi khul raha hai. Yahan pe kuch show hi nahi raha. Mera product jitna listing kiya tha woh bhi nahi dikh raha hai. Matlab wagera wagera kuch bhi buylead wagera kuch nahi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Buylead bhi nahi dikh raha hai. Ah, ek second ek second. Ek minute rukiye. Main aapko. Lead manager lead manager mein apan check karte hai lead manager woh karte hai dekhte hai toh lead manager mein woh kuch dikh raha hai.
Executive: Lead manager mein toh saari dikh rahi hai jo saamne se inquiries aa rahi hai aapki.
Customer: Ji woh toh lekin woh open hona chahiye na madam woh nahi ho raha hai na open. Ye cheez main bolna chah raha hu.
Executive: Aapka lead manager wagera kuch open nahi ho raha hai?
Customer: Nahi, kuch nahi ho raha hai na.
Executive: Ek minute ek minute aap call pe raho main aapko ek link share kar rahi hu. Theek hai? Aap usko join karke aap mujhe dikhao ki kya show kar raha hai fir main aapko batati hu ek second ruko.
Customer: Ji, theek hai. Ek minute aap call pe raho.

Executive: Main bhej rahi hu aapko aap apna mail check karo ek baar sir.


Executive: Mila aapko link sir?
Customer: Haan ek. You can also keep yourself updated through IndiaMART.
Customer: Kya cheez aap send kiye hai?
Executive: Haan maine aapko Google Meet ki link share kiya hai.
Customer: Haan theek hai theek hai join ji. Haan aap join karo usko.


Executive: Ah sir main aapko like apne PC laptop se hi connect kar rahi hu kyuki main ek do cheezon pe online nahi reh sakti. Toh main call disconnect karke usi se hi aapko connect karungi. Aap call pe raho video call pe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to see account manager details.

- Unable to see product listing and buyleads.

- Lead manager is not opening.



Resolution:

- Executive shared her contact details.

- Executive asked to check profile for account manager details.

- Executive shared a Google Meet link for screen sharing.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect via video call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, profile, buyleads, lead manager
